14#ifndef UNIX_ERRNO2RESULT_H
15#define UNIX_ERRNO2RESULT_H 1
16
17/*! \file */
18
19/* XXXDCL this should be moved to lib/isc/include/isc/errno2result.h. */
20
21#include <errno.h> /* Provides errno. */
22#include <stdbool.h>
23
24#include <isc/lang.h>
25#include <isc/types.h>
26
27ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
28
29#define isc__errno2result(x) isc___errno2result(x, true, __FILE__, __LINE__)
30
31isc_result_t
32isc___errno2result(int posixerrno, bool dolog,
33 const char *file, unsigned int line);
34
35ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
36
37#endif /* UNIX_ERRNO2RESULT_H */
